String.Source: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. The Jarl of Whiterun has agreed to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach. Now I need some way to lure a dragon into the trap. Esbern or Paarthurnax might be able to help.
String.Dest: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. The Jarl of Whiterun has agreed to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach. Now I need some way to lure a dragon into the trap. Esbern or Paarthurnax might be able to help.

String.Source: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. I've learned that Dragonsreach, the Jarl's palace in Whiterun, was once used to imprison a dragon. If I can arrange a truce in the civil war, the Jarl of Whiterun has agreed to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach. Then I can interrogate the dragon and learn the location of Alduin's lair so I can finish him off, once and for all.
String.Dest: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. I've learned that Dragonsreach, the Jarl's palace in Whiterun, was once used to imprison a dragon. If I can arrange a truce in the civil war, the Jarl of Whiterun has agreed to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach. Then I can interrogate the dragon and learn the location of Alduin's lair so I can finish him off, once and for all.

String.Source: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. I've learned that Dragonsreach, the Jarl's palace in Whiterun, was once used to imprison a dragon. I need to persuade the Jarl of Whiterun to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach.
String.Dest: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. I've learned that Dragonsreach, the Jarl's palace in Whiterun, was once used to imprison a dragon. I need to persuade the Jarl of Whiterun to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach.

String.Source: The Jarl of Whiterun won't help me capture a dragon as long as the civil war is raging. If I can get the Greybeards to host a peace council, I can try to convince the Imperials and the Stormcloaks to agree to a truce in order to defeat Alduin, who is a threat to both sides in the civil war.
String.Dest: The Jarl of Whiterun won't help me capture a dragon as long as the civil war is raging. If I can get the Greybeards to host a peace council, I can try to convince the Imperials and the Stormcloaks to agree to a truce in order to defeat Alduin, who is a threat to both sides in the civil war.

String.Source: I have joined the Companions, the legendary warrior band of Whiterun.
String.Dest: I have joined the Companions, the legendary warrior band of Whiterun.

String.Source: The legendary warrior band of Whiterun, the Companions have agreed to let me join them, if I can handle some preliminary tasks for them.
String.Dest: The legendary warrior band of Whiterun, the Companions have agreed to let me join them, if I can handle some preliminary tasks for them.

String.Source: I've discovered the bust of a man named the Gray Fox inside Mercer Frey's House. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
String.Dest: I've discovered the bust of a man named the Gray Fox inside Mercer Frey's House. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.

String.Source: I've discovered the intricately crafted model of a sailing ship inside Snow Veil Sanctum. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
String.Dest: I've discovered the intricately crafted model of a sailing ship inside Snow Veil Sanctum. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.

String.Source: Brynjolf has been convinced of Karliah's innocence and Mercer's betrayal after investigating the Guild's treasure vault and finding it empty. Of greater mystery is the fact that the vault can only be opened with two keys and is utterly impervious to lockpicking. How Mercer Frey could have breached it is a mystery to us all.
String.Dest: Brynjolf has been convinced of Karliah's innocence and Mercer's betrayal after investigating the Guild's treasure vault and finding it empty. Of greater mystery is the fact that the vault can only be opened with two keys and is utterly impervious to lockpicking. How Mercer Frey could have breached it is a mystery to us all.

String.Source: I've discovered an unusual statue of a queen bee within Goldenglow Estate. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
String.Dest: I've discovered an unusual statue of a queen bee within Goldenglow Estate. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.

String.Source: Boethiah revealed herself to me. I am to slay her previous champion, and having done so, don the Ebony Mail. So doing, she will make me her champion.
String.Dest: Boethiah revealed herself to me. I am to slay her previous champion, and having done so, don the Ebony Mail. So doing, she will make me her champion.

String.Source: Boethiah has appeared using <Alias=DeadFriend>'s corpse as a vessel. She will give a special task to whichever of her cultists are left alive after we fight to the death.
String.Dest: Boethiah has appeared using <Alias=DeadFriend>'s corpse as a vessel. She will give a special task to whichever of her cultists are left alive after we fight to the death.

String.Source: I am to lead someone to the Shrine of Boethiah, instruct them to touch the Pillar of Sacrifice, and once trapped by it's magic, slay them. If I do this Boethiah will appear.
String.Dest: I am to lead someone to the Shrine of Boethiah, instruct them to touch the Pillar of Sacrifice, and once trapped by it's magic, slay them. If I do this Boethiah will appear.

String.Source: I found a book that mentioned a cult of Boethiah in the mountains near Windhelm.
String.Dest: I found a book that mentioned a cult of Boethiah in the mountains near Windhelm.

String.Source: I've found a strange gem. An otherworldly voice is commanding me to bring it to Mount Kilkreath.
String.Dest: I've found a strange gem. An otherworldly voice is commanding me to bring it to Mount Kilkreath.

String.Source: Nurelion's assistant, Quintus, believes he's found a way to repair the White Phial, and has enlisted me to track down some materials for him.
String.Dest: Nurelion's assistant, Quintus, believes he's found a way to repair the White Phial, and has enlisted me to track down some materials for him.

String.Source: Nurelion's assistant, Quintus, believes he's found a way to repair the White Phial.
String.Dest: Nurelion's assistant, Quintus, believes he's found a way to repair the White Phial.

String.Source: I have defeated Potema and been rewarded by Falk Firebeard.
String.Dest: I have defeated Potema and been rewarded by Falk Firebeard.

String.Source: The Companions leaders say they don't have any more work for me, but that I should speak to Skjor about "the next steps."
String.Dest: The Companions leaders say they don't have any more work for me, but that I should speak to Skjor about "the next steps."

String.Source: <Alias=Questgiver> says that the Companions have been waiting for my return. I'm supposed to follow <Alias.PronounObj=Questgiver>.
String.Dest: <Alias=Questgiver> says that the Companions have been waiting for my return. I'm supposed to follow <Alias.PronounObj=Questgiver>.

String.Source: Vilkas and I avenged Kodlak's death by bringing ruin to the Silver Hand.
String.Dest: Vilkas and I avenged Kodlak's death by bringing ruin to the Silver Hand.

String.Source: Vilkas has come with me to avenge the death of Kodlak by wiping out the Silver Hand.
String.Dest: Vilkas has come with me to avenge the death of Kodlak by wiping out the Silver Hand.

String.Source: I have confronted and stopped a group of necromancers attempting to summon Potema, the Wolf Queen, in Wolfskull Cave. I should return to Falk Firebeard with the news.
String.Dest: I have confronted and stopped a group of necromancers attempting to summon Potema, the Wolf Queen, in Wolfskull Cave. I should return to Falk Firebeard with the news.

String.Source: I've brought the Crown of Barenziah back to Vex, who has restored it to its original condition where it now serves as a paragon for the Thieves Guild.
String.Dest: I've brought the Crown of Barenziah back to Vex, who has restored it to its original condition where it now serves as a paragon for the Thieves Guild.

String.Source: I've found an unusual gem which seems to exhibit magical properties. I should bring it to Vex at the Thieves Guild for an appraisal.
String.Dest: I've found an unusual gem which seems to exhibit magical properties. I should bring it to Vex at the Thieves Guild for an appraisal.

String.Source: The most naturally talented warriors in Tamriel, the Redguards of Hammerfell have a hardy constitution and a natural resistance to poison. They can call upon an Adrenaline Rush in combat.
String.Dest: The most naturally talented warriors in Tamriel, the Redguards of Hammerfell have a hardy constitution and a natural resistance to poison. They can call upon an Adrenaline Rush in combat.

String.Source: Thieves stolen Finn's Lute from the Bards College over a year ago. Inge Six-Fingers has asked me to recover the lute from their stronghold.
String.Dest: Thieves stolen Finn's Lute from the Bards College over a year ago. Inge Six-Fingers has asked me to recover the lute from their stronghold.

String.Source: Giraud Gemane of the Bards College has found a clue to the location of the legendary drum of Rjorn. He's asked me to go to Halldir's Cairn and retrieve it.
String.Dest: Giraud Gemane of the Bards College has found a clue to the location of the legendary drum of Rjorn. He's asked me to go to Halldir's Cairn and retrieve it.

String.Source: Maven Black-Briar has sent me to Whiterun where I am to meet with someone named Mallus Maccius. Together, our goal is to bring down one of Maven's competitors, Honningbrew Meadery and discover where he obtained the financing to take her on.
String.Dest: Maven Black-Briar has sent me to Whiterun where I am to meet with someone named Mallus Maccius. Together, our goal is to bring down one of Maven's competitors, Honningbrew Meadery and discover where he obtained the financing to take her on.

String.Source: Meridia has commanded me to enter Kilkreath Ruins, destroy Malkoran, and retrieve the artifact Dawnbreaker. I will need to guide a beam of light through the ruins which will open the way for me.
String.Dest: Meridia has commanded me to enter Kilkreath Ruins, destroy Malkoran, and retrieve the artifact Dawnbreaker. I will need to guide a beam of light through the ruins which will open the way for me.

String.Source: Karliah believes the only proof that could expose Mercer's treachery can be found within the pages of Gallus's journal which she recovered from Snow Veil Sanctum. Unfortunately, the journal is written in some sort of code that needs to be deciphered. Our only hope is Enthir, one of Karliah and Gallus's former acquaintances who is a wizard at the College of Winterhold.
String.Dest: Karliah believes the only proof that could expose Mercer's treachery can be found within the pages of Gallus's journal which she recovered from Snow Veil Sanctum. Unfortunately, the journal is written in some sort of code that needs to be deciphered. Our only hope is Enthir, one of Karliah and Gallus's former acquaintances who is a wizard at the College of Winterhold.

String.Source: I've discovered an curious Dwemer-constructed puzzle cube inside Calcelmo's Quarters in Markarth. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
String.Dest: I've discovered an curious Dwemer-constructed puzzle cube inside Calcelmo's Quarters in Markarth. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.

String.Source: This reptilian race, well-suited for the treacherous swamps of their Black Marsh homeland, has developed a natural resistance to diseases and the ability to breathe underwater. They can call upon the Histskin to regenerate health very quickly.
String.Dest: This reptilian race, well-suited for the treacherous swamps of their Black Marsh homeland, has developed a natural resistance to diseases and the ability to breathe underwater. They can call upon the Histskin to regenerate health very quickly.

String.Source: I've discovered an unusual golden decanter inside Honningbrew Meadery. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
String.Dest: I've discovered an unusual golden decanter inside Honningbrew Meadery. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.

String.Source: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. With the help of the Jarl of Whiterun, I've trapped the dragon Odahviing in Dragonsreach. Odahviing revealed that Alduin's lair is located in the ancient temple of Skuldafn, which is only accessible by air. Odahviing has offered to take me there, in return for his freedom.
String.Dest: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. With the help of the Jarl of Whiterun, I've trapped the dragon Odahviing in Dragonsreach. Odahviing revealed that Alduin's lair is located in the ancient temple of Skuldafn, which is only accessible by air. Odahviing has offered to take me there, in return for his freedom.

String.Source: The most naturally talented warriors in Tamriel, the Redguards of Hammerfell have a hardy constitution and a natural resistance to poison. They can call upon an Adrenaline Rush in combat.
String.Dest: The most naturally talented warriors in Tamriel, the Redguards of Hammerfell have a hardy constitution and a natural resistance to poison. They can call upon an Adrenaline Rush in combat.

String.Source: Brynjolf is convinced Mercer Frey intends to perform one final heist before departing Skyrim for good. According to the plans I discovered in Riftweald Manor, he's after the "Eyes of the Falmer," two gems of enormous value. If we have any hopes of intercepting Mercer, we need to proceed to their location immediately.
String.Dest: Brynjolf is convinced Mercer Frey intends to perform one final heist before departing Skyrim for good. According to the plans I discovered in Riftweald Manor, he's after the "Eyes of the Falmer," two gems of enormous value. If we have any hopes of intercepting Mercer, we need to proceed to their location immediately.

String.Source: The unusual gem has turned out to be one of twenty-four "Stones of Barenziah." According to Vex, they have little value unless the set is complete.
String.Dest: The unusual gem has turned out to be one of twenty-four "Stones of Barenziah." According to Vex, they have little value unless the set is complete.

String.Source: I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ysolda in Whiterun will give me more information about Same once I return the ring I borrowed from her to give to a hagraven Witchmist Grove.
String.Dest: I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ysolda in Whiterun will give me more information about Same once I return the ring I borrowed from her to give to a hagraven Witchmist Grove.

String.Source: Hailing from the province of Elsweyr, they are intelligent, quick, and agile. They make excellent thieves due to their natural stealthiness. All Khajiit can see in the dark at will and have unarmed claw attacks.
String.Dest: Hailing from the province of Elsweyr, they are intelligent, quick, and agile. They make excellent thieves due to their natural stealthiness. All Khajiit can see in the dark at will and have unarmed claw attacks.

String.Source: Enthir has informed me that Gallus's Journal is written in Falmer. He's directed me to seek out Calcelmo, the Court Wizard in Markarth who is the foremost authority on them in hopes of obtaining a translation.
String.Dest: Enthir has informed me that Gallus's Journal is written in Falmer. He's directed me to seek out Calcelmo, the Court Wizard in Markarth who is the foremost authority on them in hopes of obtaining a translation.

String.Source: Hailing from the province of Elsweyr, they are intelligent, quick, and agile. They make excellent thieves due to their natural stealthiness. All Khajiit can see in the dark and have deadly claw attacks.
String.Dest: Hailing from the province of Elsweyr, they are intelligent, quick, and agile. They make excellent thieves due to their natural stealthiness. All Khajiit can see in the dark and have deadly claw attacks.

String.Source: This reptilian race, well-suited for the treacherous swamps of their Black Marsh homeland, has developed a natural resistance to diseases and the ability to breathe underwater. They can call upon the Histskin to regenerate health very quickly.
String.Dest: This reptilian race, well-suited for the treacherous swamps of their Black Marsh homeland, has developed a natural resistance to diseases and the ability to breathe underwater. They can call upon the Histskin to regenerate health very quickly.

String.Source: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. She's going to talk to her contacts about how we can infiltrate the Thalmor Embassy.
String.Dest: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. She's going to talk to her contacts about how we can infiltrate the Thalmor Embassy.

String.Source: I helped repair the White Phial in time for Nurelion to see it before he died.
String.Dest: I helped repair the White Phial in time for Nurelion to see it before he died.

String.Source: Natives of Cyrodiil, they have proved to be shrewd diplomats and traders. They are skilled with combat and magic. Anywhere gold coins might be found, Imperials always seem to find a few more. They can call upon the Voice of the Emperor to calm an enemy.
String.Dest: Natives of Cyrodiil, they have proved to be shrewd diplomats and traders. They are skilled with combat and magic. Anywhere gold coins might be found, Imperials always seem to find a few more. They can call upon the Voice of the Emperor to calm an enemy.

String.Source: Windhelm is plagued by a shadowy killer. I've been asked to help investigate the latest murder.
String.Dest: Windhelm is plagued by a shadowy killer. I've been asked to help investigate the latest murder.

String.Source: I've met Sinding, a werewolf who the Daedric Lord Hircine has punished by preventing his transformations. Hircine has asked me to finish the job and gain his favor by killing Sinding.
String.Dest: I've met Sinding, a werewolf who the Daedric Lord Hircine has punished by preventing his transformations. Hircine has asked me to finish the job and gain his favor by killing Sinding.

String.Source: I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ysolda in Whiterun will give me more information about Same once I return the ring I borrowed from her to give to someone in Witchmist Grove.
String.Dest: I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ysolda in Whiterun will give me more information about Same once I return the ring I borrowed from her to give to someone in Witchmist Grove.

String.Source: Potema has been summoned from beyond the grave. I've defeated her in the Catacombs and retrieved her bones. I must return them to Styrr for blessing and tell Falk Potema has been defeated.
String.Dest: Potema has been summoned from beyond the grave. I've defeated her in the Catacombs and retrieved her bones. I must return them to Styrr for blessing and tell Falk Potema has been defeated.

String.Source: Silus Vesuius is offering me gold to retrieve the three pieces of Mehrunes' Razor from their current owners. Drascua has the pommel, Ghunzul has the blade shards, and Jorgen has the hilt.
String.Dest: Silus Vesuius is offering me gold to retrieve the three pieces of Mehrunes' Razor from their current owners. Drascua has the pommel, Ghunzul has the blade shards, and Jorgen has the hilt.

String.Source: Brynjolf has promised me more work if I'm able to locate him at a tavern called the Ragged Flagon. Judging from the dangerous nature of its location, it seems as though he's having me perform some type of initiation, but I can't be certain.
String.Dest: Brynjolf has promised me more work if I'm able to locate him at a tavern called the Ragged Flagon. Judging from the dangerous nature of its location, it seems as though he's having me perform some type of initiation, but I can't be certain.

String.Source: The Greybeards have summoned me to their monastery of High Hrothgar on the slopes of the Throat of the World. They seem to have learned of the mysterious power that I gained when I killed the dragon outside Whiterun.
String.Dest: The Greybeards have summoned me to their monastery of High Hrothgar on the slopes of the Throat of the World. They seem to have learned of the mysterious power that I gained when I killed the dragon outside Whiterun.

String.Source: I have awoken in the Temple Of Dibella in Markarth. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. I have no idea how I got here but a priestess has told me I trashed the Temple. I have cleaned up the Temple, if I apologize to the priestess she might tell me what happened to Sam and the staff.
String.Dest: I have awoken in the Temple Of Dibella in Markarth. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. I have no idea how I got here but a priestess has told me I trashed the Temple. I have cleaned up the Temple, if I apologize to the priestess she might tell me what happened to Sam and the staff.

String.Source: Natives of Cyrodiil, they have proved to be shrewd diplomats and traders. They are skilled with combat and magic. Anywhere gold coins might be found, Imperials always seem to find a few more. They can call upon the Voice of the Emperor to calm an enemy.
String.Dest: Natives of Cyrodiil, they have proved to be shrewd diplomats and traders. They are skilled with combat and magic. Anywhere gold coins might be found, Imperials always seem to find a few more. They can call upon the Voice of the Emperor to calm an enemy.

String.Source: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. I need to locate his lair so I can finish him off, once and for all.
String.Dest: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. I need to locate his lair so I can finish him off, once and for all.

String.Source: I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ennis in Rorikstead will tell me more about what happened once I return the goat I stole from him.
String.Dest: I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ennis in Rorikstead will tell me more about what happened once I return the goat I stole from him.

String.Source: Arrows that hit the shield do no damage.
String.Dest: Arrows that hit the shield do no damage.

String.Source: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people. Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.
String.Dest: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people. Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.

String.Source: Pickpocketing bonus of 100%. Item weight and value reduce pickpocketing odds.
String.Dest: Pickpocketing bonus of 100%. Item weight and value reduce pickpocketing odds.

String.Source: In addition to their quick and perceptive grasp of spellcraft, even the humblest of Bretons can boast a resistance to shock attacks. They are particularly skilled at conjuration magic.
String.Dest: In addition to their quick and perceptive grasp of spellcraft, even the humblest of Bretons can boast a resistance to shock attacks. They are particularly skilled at conjuration magic.

String.Source: The tables have unexpectedly turned, and Mercer Frey has been revealed as Gallus's killer. I now find myself in Karliah's care after Mercer tried to murder me, claiming I'd outlasted my usefulness by witnessing their conversation. I've also discovered that Mercer, Gallus and Karliah were members of some sort of group calling themselves "The Nightingales" - guardians in service to the goddess Nocturnal. What they're protecting or what this has to do with the Guild is still a mystery to me.
String.Dest: The tables have unexpectedly turned, and Mercer Frey has been revealed as Gallus's killer. I now find myself in Karliah's care after Mercer tried to murder me, claiming I'd outlasted my usefulness by witnessing their conversation. I've also discovered that Mercer, Gallus and Karliah were members of some sort of group calling themselves "The Nightingales" - guardians in service to the goddess Nocturnal. What they're protecting or what this has to do with the Guild is still a mystery to me.

String.Source: I helped grant Kodlak Whitemane the glory of Sovngarde, and took his place as Harbinger of the Companions.
String.Dest: I helped grant Kodlak Whitemane the glory of Sovngarde, and took his place as Harbinger of the Companions.

String.Source: The people of the Wrothgarian and Dragontail Mountains, Orcish smiths are prized for their craftsmanship. Orc troops in Heavy Armor are among the finest in the Empire, and are fearsome when using their Berserker Rage.
String.Dest: The people of the Wrothgarian and Dragontail Mountains, Orcish smiths are prized for their craftsmanship. Orc troops in Heavy Armor are among the finest in the Empire, and are fearsome when using their Berserker Rage.

String.Source: I discovered that Wuunferth the Unliving was the Butcher of Windhelm, and helped bring him to justice.
String.Dest: I discovered that Wuunferth the Unliving was the Butcher of Windhelm, and helped bring him to justice.

String.Source: The clanfolk of the Western Valenwood forests, also known as "Bosmer." Wood elves make good scouts and thieves, and there are no finer archers in all of Tamriel. They have natural resistances to both poisons and diseases. They can Command Animals to fight for them.
String.Dest: The clanfolk of the Western Valenwood forests, also known as "Bosmer." Wood elves make good scouts and thieves, and there are no finer archers in all of Tamriel. They have natural resistances to both poisons and diseases. They can Command Animals to fight for them.

String.Source: Also known as "Dunmer" in their homeland of Morrowind, dark elves are noted for their stealth and magic skills. They are naturally resistant to fire and can call upon their Ancestor's Wrath to surround themselves in fire.
String.Dest: Also known as "Dunmer" in their homeland of Morrowind, dark elves are noted for their stealth and magic skills. They are naturally resistant to fire and can call upon their Ancestor's Wrath to surround themselves in fire.

String.Source: The Companions have given me one final challenge before inducting me. I'm to retrieve a fragment of Wuuthrad, the Blade of Ysgramor, from <Alias=Dungeon> while <Alias=Observer> judges my valor.
String.Dest: The Companions have given me one final challenge before inducting me. I'm to retrieve a fragment of Wuuthrad, the Blade of Ysgramor, from <Alias=Dungeon> while <Alias=Observer> judges my valor.

String.Source: Also known as "Dunmer" in their homeland of Morrowind, dark elves are noted for their stealth and magic skills. They are naturally resistant to fire and can call upon their Ancestor's Wrath to surround themselves in fire.
String.Dest: Also known as "Dunmer" in their homeland of Morrowind, dark elves are noted for their stealth and magic skills. They are naturally resistant to fire and can call upon their Ancestor's Wrath to surround themselves in fire.

String.Source: Also known as "Altmer" in their homeland of Summerset Isle, the high elves are the most strongly gifted in the arcane arts of all the races. They can call upon their Highborn power to regenerate Magicka quickly.
String.Dest: Also known as "Altmer" in their homeland of Summerset Isle, the high elves are the most strongly gifted in the arcane arts of all the races. They can call upon their Highborn power to regenerate Magicka quickly.

String.Source: A representative from Dragon Bridge has appealed to the court in Solitude for help investigating Wolfskull Cave. Falk Firebeard has asked me to clear out the cave.
String.Dest: A representative from Dragon Bridge has appealed to the court in Solitude for help investigating Wolfskull Cave. Falk Firebeard has asked me to clear out the cave.

String.Source: Vex has revealed to me that the Crown of Barenziah is actually a paragon for the Thieves Guild. If I can recover the crown from Tolvald's Cave, she should be able to restore our paragon to its full strength.
String.Dest: Vex has revealed to me that the Crown of Barenziah is actually a paragon for the Thieves Guild. If I can recover the crown from Tolvald's Cave, she should be able to restore our paragon to its full strength.

String.Source: Aela and I retrieved a Totem of Hircine from <Alias=Dungeon>.
String.Dest: Aela and I retrieved a Totem of Hircine from <Alias=Dungeon>.

String.Source: Aela has tracked one of the Totems of Hircine to <Alias=Dungeon>, and has come with me to retrieve it.
String.Dest: Aela has tracked one of the Totems of Hircine to <Alias=Dungeon>, and has come with me to retrieve it.

String.Source: Also known as "Altmer" in their homeland of Summerset Isle, the high elves are the most strongly gifted in the arcane arts of all the races. They can call upon their Highborn power to regenerate magicka quickly.
String.Dest: Also known as "Altmer" in their homeland of Summerset Isle, the high elves are the most strongly gifted in the arcane arts of all the races. They can call upon their Highborn power to regenerate magicka quickly.

String.Source: A representative from Dragon Bridge has appealed to the court in Solitude for help investigating Wolfskull Cave. Falk Firebeard is looking for someone to look into the issue.
String.Dest: A representative from Dragon Bridge has appealed to the court in Solitude for help investigating Wolfskull Cave. Falk Firebeard is looking for someone to look into the issue.

String.Source: The clanfolk of the Western Valenwood forests, also known as "Bosmer." Wood elves make good scouts and thieves, and there are no finer archers in all of Tamriel. They have natural resistances to both poisons and diseases. They can Command Animals to fight for them.
String.Dest: The clanfolk of the Western Valenwood forests, also known as "Bosmer." Wood elves make good scouts and thieves, and there are no finer archers in all of Tamriel. They have natural resistances to both poisons and diseases. They can Command Animals to fight for them.

String.Source: I successfully retrieved a fragment of Wuuthrad, the Blade of Ysgramor, to earn my place in the Companions.
String.Dest: I successfully retrieved a fragment of Wuuthrad, the Blade of Ysgramor, to earn my place in the Companions.

String.Source: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who is supposed to be an expert on ancient dragon lore. I found Esbern hiding in the Ratway in Riften, and convinced him to let me in to explain myself.
String.Dest: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who is supposed to be an expert on ancient dragon lore. I found Esbern hiding in the Ratway in Riften, and convinced him to let me in to explain myself.

String.Source: I have helped Madanach escape Cidhna Mine, and he and his Forsworn have taken credit for all my past crime, clearing my name in the Reach.
String.Dest: I have helped Madanach escape Cidhna Mine, and he and his Forsworn have taken credit for all my past crime, clearing my name in the Reach.

String.Source: Onmund has asked me to help him get an amulet with sentimental value back from Enthir.
String.Dest: Onmund has asked me to help him get an amulet with sentimental value back from Enthir.

String.Source: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. Her contact, Malborn, smuggled some of my equipment into the Thalmor ambassador's manor. I infiltrated the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. Now I need to search the ambassador's office to find out what the Thalmor know about the dragons.
String.Dest: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. Her contact, Malborn, smuggled some of my equipment into the Thalmor ambassador's manor. I infiltrated the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. Now I need to search the ambassador's office to find out what the Thalmor know about the dragons.

String.Source: Enthir insists that Onmund sold him the amulet in question, and he will not go back on a trade. If, however, I can recover a particular staff for Enthir, he'll give me the amulet. I'll need to search <Alias=StaffLocation> for the staff.
String.Dest: Enthir insists that Onmund sold him the amulet in question, and he will not go back on a trade. If, however, I can recover a particular staff for Enthir, he'll give me the amulet. I'll need to search <Alias=StaffLocation> for the staff.

String.Source: Eorlund needs the fragments of Wuuthrad to prepare them for remounting in Jorrvaskr.
String.Dest: Eorlund needs the fragments of Wuuthrad to prepare them for remounting in Jorrvaskr.

String.Source: As a member of the Circle, I need to convene in the Underforge to determine the next steps for the Companions following the death of Kodak Whitman.
String.Dest: As a member of the Circle, I need to convene in the Underforge to determine the next steps for the Companions following the death of Kodak Whitman.

String.Source: I've helped Saadia escape the clutches of the Alik'r sent after her. With their leader defeated, she believes the rest of them will scatter, affording her some much-needed safety for now.
String.Dest: I've helped Saadia escape the clutches of the Alik'r sent after her. With their leader defeated, she believes the rest of them will scatter, affording her some much-needed safety for now.

String.Source: The information I obtained from Honningbrew Meadery points to the same anonymous buyer of Goldenglow Estate. If successful, this individual would have completely estranged Maven Black-Briar from the Guild and destroyed it economically. It's becoming painfully obvious that it's time to shed some light on our mysterious adversary before they have a chance to strike again.
String.Dest: The information I obtained from Honningbrew Meadery points to the same anonymous buyer of Goldenglow Estate. If successful, this individual would have completely estranged Maven Black-Briar from the Guild and destroyed it economically. It's becoming painfully obvious that it's time to shed some light on our mysterious adversary before they have a chance to strike again.

String.Source: After Enthir successfully translated Gallus's journal, I've discovered that Mercer's motivations transcended simple greed or murder. As a member of the Nightingales, Mercer was tasked with guarding a place called The Twilight Sepulcher, the Temple of Nocturnal. According to Gallus, he defiled the temple and betrayed the Thieves Guild. Karliah insists we bring this information to Brynjolf immediately.
String.Dest: After Enthir successfully translated Gallus's journal, I've discovered that Mercer's motivations transcended simple greed or murder. As a member of the Nightingales, Mercer was tasked with guarding a place called The Twilight Sepulcher, the Temple of Nocturnal. According to Gallus, he defiled the temple and betrayed the Thieves Guild. Karliah insists we bring this information to Brynjolf immediately.

String.Source: Mehrunes Dagon has promised to reforge his Razor if I place my hands on his altar.
String.Dest: Mehrunes Dagon has promised to reforge his Razor if I place my hands on his altar.

String.Source: Mehrunes Dagon has asked me to kill Silus Vesuius. I will be given the reforged Razor if I succeed.
String.Dest: Mehrunes Dagon has asked me to kill Silus Vesuius. I will be given the reforged Razor if I succeed.

String.Source: I killed an escaped criminal in <Alias=LocationHold>.
String.Dest: I killed an escaped criminal in <Alias=LocationHold>.

String.Source: There is an escaped criminal wandering <Alias=LocationHold>. I'm supposed to track <Alias.PronounObj=Criminal> down and kill <Alias.PronounObj=Criminal>.
String.Dest: There is an escaped criminal wandering <Alias=LocationHold>. I'm supposed to track <Alias.PronounObj=Criminal> down and kill <Alias.PronounObj=Criminal>.

String.Source: The Jarl of Whiterun wouldn't help me capture a dragon as long as the civil war was raging. Arngeir agreed to host a peace council at High Hrothgar. With Esbern's help, I persuaded General Tullius and Ulfric Stormcloak to agree to a truce in order to defeat Alduin, who is a threat to both sides in the civil war.
String.Dest: The Jarl of Whiterun wouldn't help me capture a dragon as long as the civil war was raging. Arngeir agreed to host a peace council at High Hrothgar. With Esbern's help, I persuaded General Tullius and Ulfric Stormcloak to agree to a truce in order to defeat Alduin, who is a threat to both sides in the civil war.

String.Source: The Greybeards summoned me to their monastery of High Hrothgar on the slopes of the Throat of the World. I spoke to Arngeir, one of the Greybeards, who believes that I am "Dragonborn", which means I am especially gifted in the use of the Voice. They have offered to help me learn to use my new abilities.
String.Dest: The Greybeards summoned me to their monastery of High Hrothgar on the slopes of the Throat of the World. I spoke to Arngeir, one of the Greybeards, who believes that I am "Dragonborn", which means I am especially gifted in the use of the Voice. They have offered to help me learn to use my new abilities.

String.Source: Arniel has finally revealed to me that his secret project deals with the disappearance of the dwarves, though he hasn't been clear about how his work relates to it. He's given me a warped soul gem, and asked me to find several Dwarven Convectors in the various ruins around Skyrim. I'm supposed to place the gem inside a convector, and then heat it using a spell Arniel has taught me. When I've done this several times, I should return the gem to Arniel.
String.Dest: Arniel has finally revealed to me that his secret project deals with the disappearance of the dwarves, though he hasn't been clear about how his work relates to it. He's given me a warped soul gem, and asked me to find several Dwarven Convectors in the various ruins around Skyrim. I'm supposed to place the gem inside a convector, and then heat it using a spell Arniel has taught me. When I've done this several times, I should return the gem to Arniel.

String.Source: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. With the help of her contact, Malborn, I infiltrated the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. I've now learned that the Thalmor are just as in the dark as we are - in fact, they're searching Riften for a Blade named Esbern, who they believe knows what the return of the dragons means.
String.Dest: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. With the help of her contact, Malborn, I infiltrated the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. I've now learned that the Thalmor are just as in the dark as we are - in fact, they're searching Riften for a Blade named Esbern, who they believe knows what the return of the dragons means.

String.Source: I've passed through Alduin's portal into Sovngarde, the realm of Aetherius where the souls of Nord heroes go to feast and battle until the final reckoning. Alduin has laid some kind of soul-snare across the valley of Sovngarde, a mist where he hides and feeds upon the trapped souls. My only hope is to reach the Hall of Heroes.
String.Dest: I've passed through Alduin's portal into Sovngarde, the realm of Aetherius where the souls of Nord heroes go to feast and battle until the final reckoning. Alduin has laid some kind of soul-snare across the valley of Sovngarde, a mist where he hides and feeds upon the trapped souls. My only hope is to reach the Hall of Heroes.

String.Source: Onmund is grateful that I was able to deal with Enthir and return his amulet.
String.Dest: Onmund is grateful that I was able to deal with Enthir and return his amulet.

String.Source: Enthir agreed to return Onmund's amulet to him, and has given it to me. I need to make sure it gets back to Onmund.
String.Dest: Enthir agreed to return Onmund's amulet to him, and has given it to me. I need to make sure it gets back to Onmund.

String.Source: I have found the staff that Enthir wanted, and need to deliver it to him so that he'll exchange it for Onmund's amulet.
String.Dest: I have found the staff that Enthir wanted, and need to deliver it to him so that he'll exchange it for Onmund's amulet.

String.Source: After making arrangements with Kematu, I've delivered Saadia to him. He assures me that she will be taken back to Hammerfell alive, though after that her fate is no longer in his hands.
String.Dest: After making arrangements with Kematu, I've delivered Saadia to him. He assures me that she will be taken back to Hammerfell alive, though after that her fate is no longer in his hands.

String.Source: I have killed Silus Vesuius for Mehrunes Dagon. I should speak to the Lord of Destruction through his altar.
String.Dest: I have killed Silus Vesuius for Mehrunes Dagon. I should speak to the Lord of Destruction through his altar.

String.Source: Thonar Silver-Blood has granted me a pardon for killing Madanach. My name has now been cleared in the Reach.
String.Dest: Thonar Silver-Blood has granted me a pardon for killing Madanach. My name has now been cleared in the Reach.

String.Source: [pagebreak]
String.Dest: [pagebreak]

String.Source: The Jarl of Whiterun won't help me capture a dragon as long as the civil war is raging. Arngeir has agreed to host a peace council at High Hrothgar. I need to convince the Imperials and the Stormcloaks to agree to a truce in order to defeat Alduin, who is a threat to both sides in the civil war.
String.Dest: The Jarl of Whiterun won't help me capture a dragon as long as the civil war is raging. Arngeir has agreed to host a peace council at High Hrothgar. I need to convince the Imperials and the Stormcloaks to agree to a truce in order to defeat Alduin, who is a threat to both sides in the civil war.

String.Source: Health, Magicka, and Stamina do not recover while in Sunlight and are reduced by <15> points.
String.Dest: Health, Magicka, and Stamina do not recover while in Sunlight and are reduced by <15> points.

String.Source: Health, Magicka, and Stamina do not recover while in Sunlight and are reduced by <60> points.
String.Dest: Health, Magicka, and Stamina do not recover while in Sunlight and are reduced by <60> points.

String.Source: I've once again helped Arniel with his secret, and very vague, project relating to the dwarves. He implied that he's waiting for something else, and then finally maybe I'll see what this is all about.
String.Dest: I've once again helped Arniel with his secret, and very vague, project relating to the dwarves. He implied that he's waiting for something else, and then finally maybe I'll see what this is all about.

String.Source: Health, Magicka, and Stamina do not recover while in Sunlight and are reduced by <45> points.
String.Dest: Health, Magicka, and Stamina do not recover while in Sunlight and are reduced by <45> points.

String.Source: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. With the help of her contact, Malborn, I infiltrated the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. I learned that the Thalmor are just as in the dark as we are - in fact, they're searching Riften for a Blade named Esbern, who they believe knows what the return of the dragons means.
String.Dest: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. With the help of her contact, Malborn, I infiltrated the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. I learned that the Thalmor are just as in the dark as we are - in fact, they're searching Riften for a Blade named Esbern, who they believe knows what the return of the dragons means.

String.Source: Health, Magicka, and Stamina do not recover while in Sunlight and are reduced by <30> points.
String.Dest: Health, Magicka, and Stamina do not recover while in Sunlight and are reduced by <30> points.

String.Source: I've successfully altered Arniel's warped soul gem, and should return it to him. It is somehow critical to his project regarding the disappearance of the dwarves; perhaps he'll explain exactly what he's up to.
String.Dest: I've successfully altered Arniel's warped soul gem, and should return it to him. It is somehow critical to his project regarding the disappearance of the dwarves; perhaps he'll explain exactly what he's up to.

String.Source: Silus Vesuius now has all three pieces of Mehrunes' Razor and wants me to help him reforge it at the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon.
String.Dest: Silus Vesuius now has all three pieces of Mehrunes' Razor and wants me to help him reforge it at the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon.

String.Source: I've passed through Alduin's portal into Sovngarde, the realm of Aetherius where the souls of Nord heroes go to feast and battle until the final reckoning. Alduin has laid some kind of soul-snare across the valley of Sovngarde, a mist where he hides and feeds upon the trapped souls. I reached the Hall of Heroes and met Gormlaith Golden-Hilt, Hakon One-Eye, and Felldir the Old - the three heroes who I saw defeat Alduin in my vision of the past. They have been permitted by Shor, the god of the underworld, to join me in my battle against Alduin.
String.Dest: I've passed through Alduin's portal into Sovngarde, the realm of Aetherius where the souls of Nord heroes go to feast and battle until the final reckoning. Alduin has laid some kind of soul-snare across the valley of Sovngarde, a mist where he hides and feeds upon the trapped souls. I reached the Hall of Heroes and met Gormlaith Golden-Hilt, Hakon One-Eye, and Felldir the Old - the three heroes who I saw defeat Alduin in my vision of the past. They have been permitted by Shor, the god of the underworld, to join me in my battle against Alduin.

String.Source: Press [Move] to walk or run, or [Jump] to jump. Press [Sprint] to sprint. Sprinting drains your stamina.
String.Dest: Press [Move] to walk or run, or [Jump] to jump. Press [Sprint] to sprint. Sprinting drains your stamina.

String.Source: Press [Forward]/[Back]/[Strafe Left]/[Strafe Right] to walk or run, or [Jump] to jump. Press [Sprint] to sprint. Sprinting drains your stamina.
String.Dest: Press [Forward]/[Back]/[Strafe Left]/[Strafe Right] to walk or run, or [Jump] to jump. Press [Sprint] to sprint. Sprinting drains your stamina.

String.Source: I have proven myself to Boethiah, and she has made me her new champion.
String.Dest: I have proven myself to Boethiah, and she has made me her new champion.

String.Source: I have entered Kilkreath Ruins, destroyed Malkoran, and retrieved the artifact Dawnstar, which Meridia has bestowed upon me for my service.
String.Dest: I have entered Kilkreath Ruins, destroyed Malkoran, and retrieved the artifact Dawnstar, which Meridia has bestowed upon me for my service.

String.Source: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who is supposed to be an expert on ancient dragon lore. I've learned that he's hiding out in the Ratway Warrens in Riften.
String.Dest: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who is supposed to be an expert on ancient dragon lore. I've learned that he's hiding out in the Ratway Warrens in Riften.

String.Source: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who is supposed to be an expert on ancient dragon lore. I found Esbern hiding in the Ratway in Riften, and convinced him to let me in to explain myself.
String.Dest: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who is supposed to be an expert on ancient dragon lore. I found Esbern hiding in the Ratway in Riften, and convinced him to let me in to explain myself.

String.Source: Additional 25% Armor bonus if wearing a matched set of Heavy Armor.
String.Dest: Additional 25% Armor bonus if wearing a matched set of Heavy Armor.

String.Source: I have discovered a shrine to Boethiah in the mountains near Windhelm.
String.Dest: I have discovered a shrine to Boethiah in the mountains near Windhelm.

String.Source: Absorb <20> magicka per second. If the target is out of magicka, absorb health instead.
String.Dest: Absorb <20> magicka per second. If the target is out of magicka, absorb health instead.

String.Source: Windhelm is plagued by a shadowy killer. I've been asked to help investigate the latest murder. Jorleif, the steward, may have advice from time to time.
String.Dest: Windhelm is plagued by a shadowy killer. I've been asked to help investigate the latest murder. Jorleif, the steward, may have advice from time to time.

String.Source: I discovered that Calixto Corrium was the Butcher of Windhelm, and helped bring him to justice.
String.Dest: I discovered that Calixto Corrium was the Butcher of Windhelm, and helped bring him to justice.

String.Source: Absorbs the life essence of your foes. Strengthened by the blood of deceit.
String.Dest: Absorbs the life essence of your foes. Strengthened by the blood of deceit.

String.Source: Press [Sprint] to sprint. Sprinting will drain your stamina.
String.Dest: Press [Sprint] to sprint. Sprinting will drain your stamina.

String.Source: I've checked with my court and apparently you're fully eligible... there's nothing standing in the way of presenting you the title.
String.Dest: I've checked with my court and apparently you're fully eligible... there's nothing standing in the way of presenting you the title.

String.Source: I've made up my mind, even if my advisors are still squabbling. I'm sending you to Windhelm.
String.Dest: I've made up my mind, even if my advisors are still squabbling. I'm sending you to Windhelm.

String.Source: I can provide you with help for her minions though. This should help you deal with the Catacombs themselves.
String.Dest: I can provide you with help for her minions though. This should help you deal with the Catacombs themselves.

String.Source: Oh don't pretend to be modest. I'm talking about your new role as champion. Apparently, you've taken my people under your wing.
String.Dest: Oh don't pretend to be modest. I'm talking about your new role as champion. Apparently, you've taken my people under your wing.

String.Source: Well, well. Aren't we the overachiever. Three possibilities, three victims. Must have been one of them, right? So why take chances...
String.Dest: Well, well. Aren't we the overachiever. Three possibilities, three victims. Must have been one of them, right? So why take chances...

String.Source: Ah, the feisty goodwife. Quite the mouth on her. Someone must have wanted her dead... right?
String.Dest: Ah, the feisty goodwife. Quite the mouth on her. Someone must have wanted her dead... right?

String.Source: When has any good ever come from talking to the Empire?
String.Dest: When has any good ever come from talking to the Empire?

String.Source: Therefore, by my authority as Jarl, I pronounce you Thane of Riften and award you all of the benefits befitting your station. Congratulations.
String.Dest: Therefore, by my authority as Jarl, I pronounce you Thane of Riften and award you all of the benefits befitting your station. Congratulations.

String.Source: I do hope mummy and father come to get me soon. Ever since that Aventus boy left, this place has gone mad.
String.Dest: I do hope mummy and father come to get me soon. Ever since that Aventus boy left, this place has gone mad.

String.Source: I don't know how you convinced Ulfric to talk to the Empire. Worse than a waste of time if you ask me.
String.Dest: I don't know how you convinced Ulfric to talk to the Empire. Worse than a waste of time if you ask me.

String.Source: Well, I'm just surprised the Gourmet is a Redguard. I had you pegged for a Wood Elf, honestly. You know, because of your use of...
String.Dest: Well, I'm just surprised the Gourmet is a Redguard. I had you pegged for a Wood Elf, honestly. You know, because of your use of...

String.Source: You're a Nord! I never would have guessed it! But where in the world did you learn to cook like that? Here in Skyrim? Or maybe somewhere less...
String.Dest: You're a Nord! I never would have guessed it! But where in the world did you learn to cook like that? Here in Skyrim? Or maybe somewhere less...

String.Source: If you think you can steal my throne by winning the hearts of the people, that's where you're wrong. Keep that in mind.
String.Dest: If you think you can steal my throne by winning the hearts of the people, that's where you're wrong. Keep that in mind.

String.Source: She was responsible for the Empire's near collapse almost five hundred years ago. I believe I have a book about her...
String.Dest: She was responsible for the Empire's near collapse almost five hundred years ago. I believe I have a book about her...

String.Source: We can talk about that once this dragon is dealt with.
String.Dest: We can talk about that once this dragon is dealt with.

String.Source: Aventus Aretino? He only lived here for awhile. I think his mother got sick and died or something. Anyway, he's gone now. He ran away.
String.Dest: Aventus Aretino? He only lived here for awhile. I think his mother got sick and died or something. Anyway, he's gone now. He ran away.

String.Source: No doubt requesting to garrison his men in my castle. How many times must I deny him?
String.Dest: No doubt requesting to garrison his men in my castle. How many times must I deny him?

String.Source: As to Potema herself, find what's left of her body, likely a skeleton. Remove it from the Catacombs and bring it back to be sanctified by Arkay.
String.Dest: As to Potema herself, find what's left of her body, likely a skeleton. Remove it from the Catacombs and bring it back to be sanctified by Arkay.

String.Source: Hmm. The fearless wife and mother, and the underhanded Khajiit. Had to be one of them, right? Interesting choice.
String.Dest: Hmm. The fearless wife and mother, and the underhanded Khajiit. Had to be one of them, right? Interesting choice.

String.Source: But Samuel told me he's back home in Windhelm, and did some kind of dark ritual. He summoned killers to murder old Grelod. He's saved us all.
String.Dest: But Samuel told me he's back home in Windhelm, and did some kind of dark ritual. He summoned killers to murder old Grelod. He's saved us all.

String.Source: Use it right, and you won't feel a thing.
String.Dest: Use it right, and you won't feel a thing.

String.Source: That's it! Wonderful! I knew I could count on you.
String.Dest: That's it! Wonderful! I knew I could count on you.

String.Source: No... no, that is all. Now... now please. I find myself very weary all of sudden.
String.Dest: No... no, that is all. Now... now please. I find myself very weary all of sudden.

String.Source: Sure am! I thank my lucky stars every time I look to the night sky that Maven took me in and gave me this opportunity.
String.Dest: Sure am! I thank my lucky stars every time I look to the night sky that Maven took me in and gave me this opportunity.

String.Source: We can talk about that once this dragon is dealt with.
String.Dest: We can talk about that once this dragon is dealt with.

String.Source: Then allow me to officially welcome you to Riften. You'll make a fine addition to our city.
String.Dest: Then allow me to officially welcome you to Riften. You'll make a fine addition to our city.

String.Source: Now, you are going to speak to this... Monk... and find out why he is here, and then he will be removed from College grounds.
String.Dest: Now, you are going to speak to this... Monk... and find out why he is here, and then he will be removed from College grounds.

String.Source: I suppose it's time I gave him an answer...
String.Dest: I suppose it's time I gave him an answer...

String.Source: Did he now? The man is persistent, I'll give him that.
String.Dest: Did he now? The man is persistent, I'll give him that.

String.Source: Deliver this axe to Ulfric Stormcloak.
String.Dest: Deliver this axe to Ulfric Stormcloak.

String.Source: I don't have any money to give you. but I can show you a few tricks I learned playing for the Winterhold wizards.
String.Dest: I don't have any money to give you. but I can show you a few tricks I learned playing for the Winterhold wizards.

String.Source: Word out on the street is that he went home to Windhelm, and people have heard strange chanting coming from his house. Looks like he really did it!
String.Dest: Word out on the street is that he went home to Windhelm, and people have heard strange chanting coming from his house. Looks like he really did it!

String.Source: Well, I just never expected the Gourmet to be a Breton. It almost seems too obvious. Some of the greatest cooks have been Bretons, and...
String.Dest: Well, I just never expected the Gourmet to be a Breton. It almost seems too obvious. Some of the greatest cooks have been Bretons, and...

String.Source: The timid warrior and the sly Khajiit. Must have been one or the other, right?
String.Dest: The timid warrior and the sly Khajiit. Must have been one or the other, right?

String.Source: Yes. I had Falk call you back because you were at the summoning, you have a connection to Potema now. You must deal with her.
String.Dest: Yes. I had Falk call you back because you were at the summoning, you have a connection to Potema now. You must deal with her.

String.Source: I expect that you'll distance yourself from the affairs of state. In other words, keep your nose out of my business and we'll do just fine.
String.Dest: I expect that you'll distance yourself from the affairs of state. In other words, keep your nose out of my business and we'll do just fine.

String.Source: Oh ho. The whimpering Nord, eh? Yes, yes, I can see how you'd come to that conclusion. Interesting choice.
String.Dest: Oh ho. The whimpering Nord, eh? Yes, yes, I can see how you'd come to that conclusion. Interesting choice.

String.Source: Hmph. Yes. Yes, I surely can. It's not something I do lightly, mind you, and it's not as specific as you might want. But yes. I will do this for you.
String.Dest: Hmph. Yes. Yes, I surely can. It's not something I do lightly, mind you, and it's not as specific as you might want. But yes. I will do this for you.

String.Source: Good. Being at the summoning created a connection to Potema, you are the one to do this.
String.Dest: Good. Being at the summoning created a connection to Potema, you are the one to do this.

String.Source: Why, just this last week I was commenting to my fellow meadery workers just how lucky we are to be working for such a charitable family.
String.Dest: Why, just this last week I was commenting to my fellow meadery workers just how lucky we are to be working for such a charitable family.

String.Source: When Aventus escaped, Grelod was so mad. I got double the beatings that day. But that won't happen ever again.
String.Dest: When Aventus escaped, Grelod was so mad. I got double the beatings that day. But that won't happen ever again.

String.Source: Grelod... murdered. Here. I... I need... air... You... you... Get out of here! Get out!
String.Dest: Grelod... murdered. Here. I... I need... air... You... you... Get out of here! Get out!

String.Source: Just remember that you're only a part of my court, this doesn't make you one of the family.
String.Dest: Just remember that you're only a part of my court, this doesn't make you one of the family.

String.Source: Begone from here! Get out of this orphanage! Help!Somebody help me!
String.Dest: Begone from here! Get out of this orphanage! Help!Somebody help me!

String.Source: Just... leave here! Leave us alone!
String.Dest: Just... leave here! Leave us alone!

String.Source: Oh, well, it's just... I never imagined the Gourmet was a Khajiit. You know, because of all the fur, and the potential for getting hair in the...
String.Dest: Oh, well, it's just... I never imagined the Gourmet was a Khajiit. You know, because of all the fur, and the potential for getting hair in the...

String.Source: All that remains now is to bestow the title upon you.
String.Dest: All that remains now is to bestow the title upon you.

String.Source: Ah Potema. Former queen of Solitude and one of the most dangerous necromancers in recorded history.
String.Dest: Ah Potema. Former queen of Solitude and one of the most dangerous necromancers in recorded history.

String.Source: It's going to take a lot more than that.
String.Dest: It's going to take a lot more than that.

String.Source: You... you're an Argonian! Where did you learn to cook like that? Surely not in Black Marsh. Why even the...
String.Dest: You... you're an Argonian! Where did you learn to cook like that? Surely not in Black Marsh. Why even the...

String.Source: Please, relax. Free your mind. Yes, that's it...
String.Dest: Please, relax. Free your mind. Yes, that's it...

String.Source: I'll come to your council. But I doubt any good will come of it.
String.Dest: I'll come to your council. But I doubt any good will come of it.

String.Source: I used to hate it here, but it's not so bad anymore. Constance is real good to us.
String.Dest: I used to hate it here, but it's not so bad anymore. Constance is real good to us.

String.Source: My son is dead! At his own wedding! Only those Imperial dogs would have dared do something like this! Damn them all to Oblivion!
String.Dest: My son is dead! At his own wedding! Only those Imperial dogs would have dared do something like this! Damn them all to Oblivion!

String.Source: Talking peace with Ulfric? You must be an optimist.
String.Dest: Talking peace with Ulfric? You must be an optimist.

String.Source: You've been a beacon of hope in these dark times for my people and I will never forget it.
String.Dest: You've been a beacon of hope in these dark times for my people and I will never forget it.

String.Source: Summoned in spirit form is not raised from the dead. She'll need help before she can return to the living.
String.Dest: Summoned in spirit form is not raised from the dead. She'll need help before she can return to the living.

String.Source: Why are you here? Killing Gaius Maro is but the first step of your contract - you must also plant the incriminating letter on his body...
String.Dest: Why are you here? Killing Gaius Maro is but the first step of your contract - you must also plant the incriminating letter on his body...

String.Source: I apologize in advance for my husband's crankiness; I promise you he means well.
String.Dest: I apologize in advance for my husband's crankiness; I promise you he means well.

String.Source: I've been informed by my steward that you've made quite an impression in the Rift; several of our citizens have expressed their admiration.
String.Dest: I've been informed by my steward that you've made quite an impression in the Rift; several of our citizens have expressed their admiration.

String.Source: You have some nerve coming back here after what you did to Keerava.
String.Dest: You have some nerve coming back here after what you did to Keerava.

String.Source: I guessed right! I... I always imagined the great Gourmet was a Wood Elf. You see, only someone with a knowledge of woodland herbs could combine...
String.Dest: I guessed right! I... I always imagined the great Gourmet was a Wood Elf. You see, only someone with a knowledge of woodland herbs could combine...

String.Source: When Aventus escaped, Grelod got meaner than ever. I really thought she was going to kill one of us. Guess not!
String.Dest: When Aventus escaped, Grelod got meaner than ever. I really thought she was going to kill one of us. Guess not!

String.Source: Token, you say? Let me see.
String.Dest: Token, you say? Let me see.

String.Source: A few days ago, one of her servants busted through a wall into the Temple of Divines. We'll need you to go into the Catacombs themselves.
String.Dest: A few days ago, one of her servants busted through a wall into the Temple of Divines. We'll need you to go into the Catacombs themselves.

String.Source: For the moment, the Wolf Queen has retreated to a place filled with dead eager to serve her. She has gone to her old Catacombs.
String.Dest: For the moment, the Wolf Queen has retreated to a place filled with dead eager to serve her. She has gone to her old Catacombs.

String.Source: I can provide you with some help with her minions.
String.Dest: I can provide you with some help with her minions.

String.Source: Oh, goodness me. You're a friend of Gabriella's, then. Well, I guess we both know why you're here.
String.Dest: Oh, goodness me. You're a friend of Gabriella's, then. Well, I guess we both know why you're here.

String.Source: However, since it wouldn't behoove me to make you disappear, I'd rather have you on my side as Thane of Riften.
String.Dest: However, since it wouldn't behoove me to make you disappear, I'd rather have you on my side as Thane of Riften.

String.Source: Oh, Aventus Aretino. He was sent here when his mother died, but he ran away.
String.Dest: Oh, Aventus Aretino. He was sent here when his mother died, but he ran away.

String.Source: Aventus Aretino. He was sent to live here after his mother died. He escaped. And...
String.Dest: Aventus Aretino. He was sent to live here after his mother died. He escaped. And...

String.Source: So, I've been hearing your name in court quite a bit lately.
String.Dest: So, I've been hearing your name in court quite a bit lately.

String.Source: I heard he went back to his house in Windhelm, to try and get the Dark Brotherhood to come and murder Grelod. And... he actually pulled it off!
String.Dest: I heard he went back to his house in Windhelm, to try and get the Dark Brotherhood to come and murder Grelod. And... he actually pulled it off!

String.Source: Before he left, he said he was going to do the Black Sacrament. You know, to call the Dark Brotherhood. So they'd come and kill old Grelod!
String.Dest: Before he left, he said he was going to do the Black Sacrament. You know, to call the Dark Brotherhood. So they'd come and kill old Grelod!

String.Source: Don't worry, I'll come to this peace council of yours.
String.Dest: Don't worry, I'll come to this peace council of yours.

String.Source: I guess all that's left is to bestow the title. What were those words again?
String.Dest: I guess all that's left is to bestow the title. What were those words again?

String.Source: Kill one person, and you can solve so many problems. I wonder at the possibilities.
String.Dest: Kill one person, and you can solve so many problems. I wonder at the possibilities.

String.Source: A little boy who lived here. Aventus Aretino. He was nice, but really quiet, and sad, because his mother just died.
String.Dest: A little boy who lived here. Aventus Aretino. He was nice, but really quiet, and sad, because his mother just died.

String.Source: You'll never see the sun again. No one escapes Cidhna Mine. No one.
String.Dest: You'll never see the sun again. No one escapes Cidhna Mine. No one.

String.Source: You've already taken all the necessary steps in becoming eligible for the title.
String.Dest: You've already taken all the necessary steps in becoming eligible for the title.

String.Source: Oh, Asgeir! My husband! My dear, sweet husband! Why would someone do this to you? Why? This was supposed to be the happiest day of my life!
String.Dest: Oh, Asgeir! My husband! My dear, sweet husband! Why would someone do this to you? Why? This was supposed to be the happiest day of my life!

String.Source: Much like Mjoll, you've become champion of our hold; helping people with their difficulties and providing assistance for their needs.
String.Dest: Much like Mjoll, you've become champion of our hold; helping people with their difficulties and providing assistance for their needs.

String.Source: Doesn't matter... the title is yours. I henceforth name you Thane of Riften. Don't disappoint me.
String.Dest: Doesn't matter... the title is yours. I henceforth name you Thane of Riften. Don't disappoint me.

String.Source: Therefore all that remains is to bestow it upon you.
String.Dest: Therefore all that remains is to bestow it upon you.

String.Source: Indeed. But I abide only those whose will is aligned to my own. Those who oppose my desires perish in the most dreadful of ways.
String.Dest: Indeed. But I abide only those whose will is aligned to my own. Those who oppose my desires perish in the most dreadful of ways.

String.Source: He ran away. Back home to Windhelm. Samuel told me he was trying to get some murderer people to come here and kill Grelod. Did he really do it?
String.Dest: He ran away. Back home to Windhelm. Samuel told me he was trying to get some murderer people to come here and kill Grelod. Did he really do it?

String.Source: She's an absolute pleasure to work for! In fact, I almost feel guilty accepting pay from her.
String.Dest: She's an absolute pleasure to work for! In fact, I almost feel guilty accepting pay from her.

String.Source: Oh, yes. Of course... the whole thane thing. I'd forgotten. If you're ready then, can we get this out of the way?
String.Dest: Oh, yes. Of course... the whole thane thing. I'd forgotten. If you're ready then, can we get this out of the way?

String.Source: Balimund pulled me out of Grelod's orphanage when I was just a child. I don't know what he saw in me, but I was glad to get out of there.
String.Dest: Balimund pulled me out of Grelod's orphanage when I was just a child. I don't know what he saw in me, but I was glad to get out of there.

String.Source: It's just... Well... you're an Orc! Ha ha ha! If the people of the Empire only knew! I mean, now I understand your need for secrecy. Most would...
String.Dest: It's just... Well... you're an Orc! Ha ha ha! If the people of the Empire only knew! I mean, now I understand your need for secrecy. Most would...

String.Source: I should slay you for such insolence!
String.Dest: I should slay you for such insolence!

String.Source: My good pleasure is not some trophy for mortal sport!
String.Dest: My good pleasure is not some trophy for mortal sport!

String.Source: You're a High Elf! I... I never would have guessed it. So many of your recipes are clearly aimed at the commonfolk. It just seems...
String.Dest: You're a High Elf! I... I never would have guessed it. So many of your recipes are clearly aimed at the commonfolk. It just seems...

String.Source: I... Well, I just can't believe the Gourmet is a Dark Elf. How difficult it must have been for you in Morrowind. The food there is...
String.Dest: I... Well, I just can't believe the Gourmet is a Dark Elf. How difficult it must have been for you in Morrowind. The food there is...

String.Source: I've been informed by my steward that you've made quite an impression in the Rift; the people won't stop blathering about you.
String.Dest: I've been informed by my steward that you've made quite an impression in the Rift; the people won't stop blathering about you.

String.Source: As the Jarl of Riften, I feel it's my duty to honor your selfless behavior by honoring you with the title Thane of Riften.
String.Dest: As the Jarl of Riften, I feel it's my duty to honor your selfless behavior by honoring you with the title Thane of Riften.

String.Source: When Aventus took off, when he said those things, about killing Grelod... I never imagined he was serious...
String.Dest: When Aventus took off, when he said those things, about killing Grelod... I never imagined he was serious...

String.Source: I remember you... You were at Helgen with us! Come to join the war? Speak with Galmar. He handles the new recruits.
String.Dest: I remember you... You were at Helgen with us! Come to join the war? Speak with Galmar. He handles the new recruits.

String.Source: Things are much better now that Grelod is dead, but still. I'm sick of this place.
String.Dest: Things are much better now that Grelod is dead, but still. I'm sick of this place.

String.Source: The blubbering barbarian and the tenacious mother. Must have been one of them, right?
String.Dest: The blubbering barbarian and the tenacious mother. Must have been one of them, right?

String.Source: That is the truth, my friend! Maven is a saint and don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
String.Dest: That is the truth, my friend! Maven is a saint and don't let anyone tell you otherwise.

String.Source: Ah, at last. I've been anxiously awaiting your return.
String.Dest: Ah, at last. I've been anxiously awaiting your return.

String.Source: I remember you, you were at Helgen. Speak to Legate Rikke. I suspect we could use someone like you.
String.Dest: I remember you, you were at Helgen. Speak to Legate Rikke. I suspect we could use someone like you.

String.Source: Thank the gods. I'll get to work on the Phial straight away.
String.Dest: Thank the gods. I'll get to work on the Phial straight away.

String.Source: Well, I don't mean to seem disappointed, but... I just never figured the Gourmet was an Imperial. I had dreamed of something more exotic, maybe...
String.Dest: Well, I don't mean to seem disappointed, but... I just never figured the Gourmet was an Imperial. I had dreamed of something more exotic, maybe...

String.Source: Constance don't care much for strangers in the orphanage. Afraid someone might hurt one of us kids. Which, I gotta admit, is kind of nice.
String.Dest: Constance don't care much for strangers in the orphanage. Afraid someone might hurt one of us kids. Which, I gotta admit, is kind of nice.

String.Source: I've spent years watching his techniques and learning his tricks. Sadly, I don't think I'll ever be as talented as he was.
String.Dest: I've spent years watching his techniques and learning his tricks. Sadly, I don't think I'll ever be as talented as he was.

String.Source: You can return this axe to our friend. The esteemed Jarl of Windhelm has my answer. Make sure he gets it.
String.Dest: You can return this axe to our friend. The esteemed Jarl of Windhelm has my answer. Make sure he gets it.

String.Source: By all the gods, the groom has been killed. At his own wedding! I can only think of my own husband...
String.Dest: By all the gods, the groom has been killed. At his own wedding! I can only think of my own husband...

String.Source: I should be the one thanking you. You've solved more problems in the short time you've been here then anyone in my court has their entire careers.
String.Dest: I should be the one thanking you. You've solved more problems in the short time you've been here then anyone in my court has their entire careers.

String.Source: I was apprenticed to Balimund before he died. He taught me everything I know about forging armor and weapons.
String.Dest: I was apprenticed to Balimund before he died. He taught me everything I know about forging armor and weapons.

String.Source: The conniving Khajiit. Cat like that was sure to have enemies. It's no wonder you chose him.
String.Dest: The conniving Khajiit. Cat like that was sure to have enemies. It's no wonder you chose him.

String.Source: I can't believe it! Grelod is dead! She's really dead!
String.Dest: I can't believe it! Grelod is dead! She's really dead!

String.Source: Ah yes. I've studied those documents... Very interesting...
String.Dest: Ah yes. I've studied those documents... Very interesting...

String.Source: Ah, there you are. I was wondering when you'd visit us again.
String.Dest: Ah, there you are. I was wondering when you'd visit us again.
